Bash(python3 -c "
data = open\(''C:/Users/dmedina/Documents/Projects/InternalClaude/Setup-Prerequisites.ps1'', ''rb''\).read\(\)
lines = data.split\(b''\\n''\)
for i, line in enumerate\(lines[-20:], start=len\(lines\)-19\):
    print\(f''Line {i}: {line!r}''\)
")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command '
$tokens = $null
$errors = $null
[System.Management.Automation.Language.Parser]::ParseFile\(""C:\\Users\\dmedina\\Documents\\Projects\\InternalClaude\\Setup-Prerequisites.ps1"", [ref]$tokens, [ref]$errors\)
foreach \($e in $errors\) {
    Write-Host ""Line $\($e.Extent.StartLineNumber\), Col $\($e.Extent.StartColumnNumber\): $\($e.Message\)""
}
Write-Host ""Total errors: $\($errors.Count\)""
')

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command '
$tokens = $null; $errors = $null
$null = [System.Management.Automation.Language.Parser]::ParseFile\(""C:\\Users\\dmedina\\Documents\\Projects\\InternalClaude\\Setup-Prerequisites.ps1"", [ref]$tokens, [ref]$errors\)
Write-Output ""=== ERRORS \($\($errors.Count\)\) ===""
foreach \($e in $errors\) {
    Write-Output ""Line $\($e.Extent.StartLineNumber\) Col $\($e.Extent.StartColumnNumber\): $\($e.Message\)""
}
')

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command '
$code = @""
Write-Host ""  1. Copy terraform.tfvars.example to terraform.tfvars""
Write-Host ""  2. Edit terraform.tfvars with your values""
Write-Host ""  3. Run: terraform init""
Write-Host ""  4. Run: terraform plan -out=tfplan""
Write-Host ""  5. Run: terraform apply tfplan""
Write-Host """"
""@
$tokens = $null; $errors = $null
$null = [System.Management.Automation.Language.Parser]::ParseInput\($code, [ref]$tokens, [ref]$errors\)
Write-Output ""Errors: $\($errors.Count\)""
foreach \($e in $errors\) { Write-Output ""  $\($e.Message\)"" }
')
